txt.en:
'Poor old Herluf. He has been in a sad state ever since the last time you came by. I am glad you came back to make things right again.

'I believe a good handful of pretty wildflowers will do the trick. Flowers that grow around here are especially lovely, and I think they will cheer his heart and make him a happy dwarf again.

'The flowers grow along the riverbanks to the north of Needlehole, and you should see them if you follow the road that leads up to the Elf-lands.'
'I am sure some bright flowers from the riverbank will cheer Herluf in no time.'
Covert Reparations IV -- Who Doesn't Like Flowers?

Ailward Chubb is confused as to why four dwarves have recently left the Inn League without so much as a word. He does not know it, but you harassed them on behalf of the Ale Association. You should make reparations if you wish to do your duty to the Inn League.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000> NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends. </rgb>
Pretty flowers can be found along the banks of the river north of Needlehole.\n\nYou should collect pretty flowers to present to Herluf.
Bring the flowers to Jafet in Needlehole
Herluf and Jafet are in Needlehole, in the Shire.\n\nYou should bring the flower-arrangement you collected to Jafet.
